name: COVID-19 Daten des Robert Koch Instituts

license.text: Commercial use of the data is prohibited

data-fields.timestamp: in seconds since EPOCH; time / date given in the data set
data-fields.iso-3166-1: DE - for the complete data set
data-fields.iso-3166-2: Last two chars of iso 3166-2 for German regions (Bundesl√§nder)
data-fields.original: Some (location) data from the original dataset, esp Landkreis
data-fields.age-lower: (optional) computed from the age group field. Only set if age group is given
data-fields.age-upper: (optional) computed from the age group field. Only set if age group is given
data-fields.sex: 'm' or 'f' - if given in the original dataset
